entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in the Natuashish area. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in the Natuashish area. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
